price: (82) And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
